company_description: On is a sports brand developing sporting goods fixed in technology, design, and impact. The company delivers industry-disrupting innovation in premium footwear, apparel, and accessories for high-performance running, outdoor, and all-day activities.
founders: Caspar Coppetti, David Allemann, Olivier Bernhard
